dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3904140J] Notice of copyright violation by vinogeek.com from cellarn
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2007 4:31 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3904140J] Notice of copyright violation by
vinogeek.com from cellarnotes.net

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Notice of copyright violation by vinogeek.com from cellarnotes.net
Added by system at Monday, Apr 30 2007 09:29 pm 
X-MailFrom: dmiller@dkop.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Mon Apr 30 21:29:50 2007 
Received: (qmail 13247 invoked by alias); 1 May 2007 02:29:50 -0000 
Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: (qmail 13244 invoked from network); 1 May 2007 02:29:50 -0000 
Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) 
  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 1 May 2007 02:29:49 -0000 
Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); 
  Mon, 30 Apr 2007 21:29:49 -0500 
Return-path: <dmiller@dkop.com> 
Delivery-date: Mon, 30 Apr 2007 21:29:49 -0500 
Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) 
 by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from dmiller@dkop.com) 
 with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
 (Exim) 
        id 1Hii7h-0004Nu-GM 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 30 Apr 2007 21:29:49 -0500 
Received: from nlpi043.sbcis.sbc.com ([207.115.36.72]) 
        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from dmiller@dkop.com) 
        with esmtp (Exim) 
        id 1Hii7V-000KQH-HZ 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 30 Apr 2007 21:29:37 -0500 
X-ORBL: [68.88.13.97] 
Received: from FamilyRoom (adsl-68-88-13-97.dsl.hstntx.swbell.net
[68.88.13.97]) 
        by nlpi043.sbcis.sbc.com (8.13.8 out.dk.spool/8.13.8) with ESMTP
id l412TIuh007661; 
        Mon, 30 Apr 2007 21:29:18 -0500 
From: "Dan Miller" <dmiller@dkop.com> 
To: <thumbswap@yahoo.com> 
Cc: <abuse@ev1servers.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com> 
Subject: Notice of copyright violation by vinogeek.com from
cellarnotes.net 
Date: Mon, 30 Apr 2007 21:29:20 -0500 
Message-ID: <02bc01c78b98$86a6d9c0$0201a8c0@FamilyRoom> 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: text/plain; 
        charset="US-ASCII" 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 
Thread-Index: AceLmIYOVZ9fCXPNRzuwc+nPX6mWew== 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 01 May 2007 02:29:49.0817 (UTC)
FILETIME=[979B3690:01C78B98] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
The material displayed at: http://www.vinogeek.com/storing/howlong.htm
is in 
violation of U.S. Copyright laws.  It is copied directly from my site
at: 
http://www.cellarnotes.net/howlongtohold.htm . 
 
I am the author of this material and the copyright holder.  I am quite
able 
to prove this in a court of law if this becomes necessary.  As required
by 
the Digital Millenium Copyright Act, I attest under penalty of perjury
that 
I am the copyright holder of this material and that it is being
displayed 
illegally and without my permission. 
 
In addition to the liability of the site owner, the hosting company is 
additionally liable should it not take action after the receipt of this 
notice. 
 
I will not be satisfied with any remedy other than the complete removal
of 
this material.  Should this friendly notice not achieve that result, my
next 
move will be to initiate legal action.  If that is necessary, I will
move to 
recover all out of pocket expenses from the offending parties. 
 
Please remove my material from this site immediately. 
 
Sincerely, 
 
Dan Miller 
Cellarnotes.net
